resources.string: This application is developed by students of I.E.S.Murgi. The application is based on two projects from previous courses, Project Ciclos and Project Orlas. It has been improved and these projects have been combined into one.
Students who developed the application in previous projects
If you do not meet any of these requirements you can submit to an access test that is available every year, usually in June or maybe in September.
Have obtained a university degree or equivalent.
Have passed the university orientation course (COU) or pre-university (PREU)
Be in possession of a degree of Technical or Technical Specialist.
Be in possession of the Bachelor\'s degree.
To access the Higher Level vocational Training it will be necessary to meet some of the following academic requirements:
If you do not meet any of these requirements, you can apply for the entrance exams that are held every year, usually in June and maybe in September.
To access the Middle Grade Vocational Training courses it will be necessary to meet one of the following academic requirements:
The IES Murgi open to teaching since the twentieth century has been teaching ESO, Bachillerato and FP.
